title.rendered: Partner Update: FDCTech Launches New Multi-Asset Platform Condor FX

content.rendered:
Our dedicated partners, FDCTech have launched a new multi asset platform for traders – Condor FX Pro 5.0. FDCTech’s new flagship product provides an institutional trading suite for professional clients with proprietary charting tools, advanced order types, level II pricing, and instant entry and execution.

The system is fully integrated by brokers into a native back office, reporting, and management technology, as well as desktop GUI, webtrader, and mobile terminals. Likewise, the platform has also been connected via API with PrimeXM, a leading provider of bridge technology and institutional liquidity. And it looks like the new product has a good start with seven licensing agreements announced along with the launch of the platform.

With MetaQuotes dominating the platform technology space as an international standard for FX brokers due to its ease of use, integration and cost, it will be interesting to see how the Condor FX Pro 5.0 will compete.
